title: Welcome Visitors
synopsis: Welcome to Chris Anderson's [[Federated Wiki]] site. I'm hoping you feel like forking my pages to your site and vice versa.

title: start your own wiki.
synopsis: To create a site, just visit federatedwiki.org with your subdomain in front and get started. Eg if you want eggs.federatedwiki.org just visit that URL to claim it.

title: Portland Green Streets
synopsis: Portland has numerous policies to encourage community uses of street space. The Portland Department of Transportation is not only excited to have folks bring them proposals, they are excited for help raising awareness about these options.
